channel.title: Comments on: Easy AIP Scallion Pancakes

item.title: By: Andy
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/easy-aip-scallion-pancakes/#comment-18">Mark</a>.
Hi! Can you also make AIP okonomiyaki? Ive seen a recipe but using Chinese yam, I only have dried ones and it doesn't work.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mark.

Hi! Can you also make AIP okonomiyaki? Ive seen a recipe but using Chinese yam, I only have dried ones and it doesn’t work.

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/easy-aip-scallion-pancakes/#comment-387">Andy</a>.
Thanks for asking about the okonomiyaki (what a great dish!)- I am not sure yet about how to make this AIP. However, I am currently working on an AIP Korean-inspired veggie pancake. Be sure to sign-up for the newsletter for the latest recipe updates!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andy.

Thanks for asking about the okonomiyaki (what a great dish!)- I am not sure yet about how to make this AIP. However, I am currently working on an AIP Korean-inspired veggie pancake. Be sure to sign-up for the newsletter for the latest recipe updates!

item.title: By: Mark
item.dc:creator: Mark
item.description: The AIP Scallion Pancakes are very good, and they are easy to make.
item.content:encoded: The AIP Scallion Pancakes are very good, and they are easy to make.
